required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Immune-enhancing Enteral Nutrition on Immunomodulation in Critically Ill Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Enteral Formula Including Immune-modulating Nutrients on Clinical Course and Immune Function in Critically Ill Patients

brief_summary.textblock: To determine whether high-protein (24% of total calorie from protein) enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients (eg, ω-3 fatty acids and antioxidants) enriched with β-glucan stimulates immune functions compared with standard enteral nutrition (control: 20% of total calorie from protein) or high-protein (24% of total calorie from protein) enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients without β-glucan in critically ill patients.

detailed_description.textblock: To determine whether high-protein (24% of total calorie from protein) enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients (eg, ω-3 fatty acids and antioxidants) enriched with β-glucan stimulates immune functions compared with standard enteral nutrition (control: 20% of total calorie from protein) or high-protein (24% of total calorie from protein) enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients without β-glucan in critically ill patients. In a randomized double-blind placebo-controlled study, 30 patients consumed 1 of 3 enteral nutrition: control, enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients enriched with β-glucan (250mg/L) or enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients without β-glucan. Enteral nutrition was initiated within 24 hours of ICU admission and continued during the ICU stay for a 7 days.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline NK cell activity at 7 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline IL-12 at 7 days
Change from baseline hs-CRP at 7 days

arm_group.description: high-protein enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients enriched with β-glucan
high-protein enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients without β-glucan

intervention.intervention_name: high-protein enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients enriched with β-glucan
intervention.description: high-protein enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients enriched with β-glucan

intervention.intervention_name: high-protein enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients without β-glucan
intervention.description: high-protein enteral nutrition of immune modulating nutrients without β-glucan

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ICU patients
Exclusion Criteria:
- ICU patients who could not receiving enteral nutrition
